DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether use application low frequency ultrasound , administer Timi3 ultrasound device , increase myocardial blood flow heart , subject reduce myocardial blood flow rest ( hibernate myocardium ) . The primary endpoint trial assess increase myocardial blood flow baseline post Timi3 Ultrasound treatment hypoperfused region myocardium . Positron emission tomography ( PET ) image use noninvasively evaluate cardiac blood flow . The hypothesis ultrasound increase blood flow hibernate myocardium .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Timi3 Ultrasound Myocardial Blow Flow Hibernating Myocardium
DOC.criteria: > /= 18 year Must reversible resting ischemia , rest nonreversible blood flow defect , stressinduced ischemia . Females childbearing potential must pregnant time study Must provide write informed consent Unable unwilling cooperate study procedure Currently enrol another clinical study followup period complete
